attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Act of Settlement is there to stop any non-protestant taken the throne of the United Kingdom as the rulling monarch is also head of the reformed Church of England there is no way a Papist or some one of any other religion could head this church. This would surely lead to the downfall of the Church and most other protestant churches around the Counrty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
